tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Heavy Periods,Ovarian Cyst Removal,Hysteroscopy,Ovarian Cyst Removal,
review: The current day medical advances and the diagnostic tests have advanced so much that the Doctor rarely needs to touch you to know what is the problem. However that¬† one small touch gives the patient so much reassurance. Doctor Usha is one such doctor who treats patients like a friend, hears them out patiently with empathy. Doctor¬† gives enough¬†time to each patient, never rushes,¬† hears out all the concerns and answers all our questions in a language that we can understand .¬† I am a patient who reads about¬† everything doctor says¬† to get the confidence that the treatment is right for me.¬† But when i met Dr Usha within 5 mins i knew i was in safe hands and i havent googled about my problem ever since. I underwent¬†laproscopic¬†left ovarian cyctectomy   ¬†hysteroscopy guided endomaterial biopsy. From diagnosing the problem to identifying the action plan and the¬† procedure,¬†everything went sooper smooth,¬† all thanks to my Doctor. ¬† ¬†¬†Not to forget the entire experience in apollo cradle Kormangala was very professional and good. ¬† ¬†¬†

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This review is about my mom's leperoscopic surgery,
My mom had a cyst in her uterus and it had to treated. Initially we visited Usha Speciality Clinic to know about the treatment , We met Dr.Usha and she explained the cause of the cyst formation , What would be emergency senarios and How to treat the cyst 
After some blood tests being negative she insisted us to go for leperoscopic surgery to remove the uterus with cyst ( Leperoscopic surgery includes only 4√ó5mm cuts in the body for surgery )
My mom being diabetic I was worried about the surgery 
Dr.Usha explained us that patients recovery with leperoscopic Surgery will be much more faster than open surgerys
Later we admitted to Apollo Cradle at Koramangala for Surgery where Dr.Usha took care of the surgery.
Cost of the treatment was also very affordable .
All of this happened in just a week and my mom's has recovered to normal within a week 
Thanks to Dr.Usha for helping us in understanding the treatment and taking care of the surgery with ease !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Before I begin, let me take this opportunity to thank Dr. Usha from the bottom of my heart. Thank you Doctor!
First thing I noticed was that she has graduated from AIIMS. I blindly went ahead.
Doctor‚Äôs explanation/communication: Right from the beginning, there was a +ve vibe. She took the details and asked us if we were willing to go ahead. We said 'Yes'. She explained what and how the body transformations would happen until the next review and then subsequent reviews thereon. We asked every silly doubts and she was prompt enough to answer all. She even read my face once when I had one doubt and made me ask it. When my wife had complains about somethings, she gave the right suggestions. She encouraged us to attend knowledgeable sessions which really really helped us, whether it was yoga/meditation session, breast-feeding or physiotherapy.

Things you liked about the doctor: There are many. Friendliness, Pleasant personality, Mentoring, Overall Support, Guidance, Care.

Areas of improvement for Doctor: I am in no position to answer this. She is just great. Diet-Plan is something she can include. It's just a suggestion.

I would refer her to anyone and everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
An amazing doc, committee, friendly, 

, wanted to write this review for a long time but with the new baby in our hands didn't quite get the time. Go I guess better late than never. 

There are some people you connect with immediate you meet them, and Dr Usha seemed like that person the first time I met her, I just felt very confident and told myself she is the doctor I am going to consult for the rest of my pregnance. Like they say rest is history, now we are blessed with a healthy boy baby. 

I remember the day of my delivery she was not in town but rushed from the airport directly to the delivery room, as soon as I saw her I was filled with delighted and confidence that everything will go smoothly from here and it did.
reply_text: Thank you Ramya.. enjoy with your little one

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Usha is a friendly and patient doctor. Though she is young, she has the calmness and maturity of a well experienced gynecologist. We were worried during initial stages of my wife's pregnancy. We were not able to detect heart beat and there was spotting in the initial few weeks. We were anxious.

She advised one week of bed rest *** **** ****** *********** ****** ***** *** ****** **** ** **** ********* **** *** ********* ****** ********* *** the UTI was gone in a week.

She was just a call away and usually returns the calls if she is busy. She helped us reduce our anxieties through out the pregnancy and we had a great experience consulting her. 

We strongly recommend Usha for anyone who is pregnant or planning a baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ***** *** ** *** **** ****** **** ** ******* ** ****** ***** 
Earlier we consulted many doctors for my mother's abdominal pain problem, but none gave proper treatment, everyone were busy making many, many times my mom got admitted in hospitals and came back without proper treatment.  
Finally we visited BGS hospital and happen to meet           Dr. Usha, who on the fist visit itself suggested for operation and she operated the very next day. 
And today my mother is completely fine and away from all pain. She does yoga, walking and very active in day today life. 
Dr. Usha in my words IS THE BEST PERSON. 
Thanks doctor, we owe you a lot. Thanks a lot doctor for helping us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I would strongly recommend and thank Dr. Usha for taking care of my wife during her pregnancy phase and also a key person for ease and smooth delivery of my baby girl with no complication or hassle. She has been instrumenta* *** ************* ** managing the complex issues if any.  She is very dedicated and passionate about her profession. She also constantly advise about the healthy practices that has to be followed before and after the delivery time. I was so amazed and happy to see my baby girl after the delivery. Thanks a ton to Dr. Usha for her continued support and observation on this case. All the best

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My wife Arpitha visited Dr. Usha for obstetrics. We found the doctor very friendly, professional, competent and caring. 

During the course of the pregnancy, my wife was diagnosed with pregnancy induced hypertension. The doctor, tried all remedial measures to control the hypertension, and also prolong the pregnancy till it was safe. 

When the hypertension did not subside, though being on maximum medication, the doctor rightly took the call to deliver the baby. 

We are very satisfied with the judgement, professionalism and competance of the doctor and would highly recommend her to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** **** ** *** **** ************* ** ***** ********** Me and My wife Priyanka Sachdeva are sincerly thankful to Dr Usha BR. Her care , dedication, friendliness, calmness, patience towards my wife during the whole phase of pregnancy made us feel comfortable all the time. My wife had normal delivery with all thanks to Dr. Usha BR. she waited for 12 hours during labour without rushing to do c section. With deep respect and trust on dr my wife passed this difficult phase. She is blessing for us to bring our baby to this world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Usha is very good and honest person . The positive attitude is what we appreciate a much and even though during the whole course of my pregnancy v have faced several issues the only reason v were able to get a cute princess to our family is because of good treatment , positive attitude , supportive nature. Also we appreciate if she wasnt there getting normal delivery was also difficult lots of thanks to her and entire Apollo Team who was at labour . Have recommended her to some of my cousins and colleagues hopefully they also get a cute prince or princess to their family. Continue the good work ..... We are totally happy with the service. Thank You Deepika Santosh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I first visited her in my 30 th week on reference of our neighbour and friend. At my first visit only i found her to be very friendly and comforting. She also did my scan and said everything is OK, since i complained of  lower baby movements.  She is very friendly and always there for you. She is always available on phone and if busy she even calls back. 
     Now i have delivered my kid and the c- sec was done by her(as we opted for it). In the OT also she was so smiling and comforting.  I have no post delivery complaints. My baby and me we both are doing fine. She is really a very good doctor in all aspects.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent doctor she was **** * ***** *** was guiding me and monitoring me throughout my pregnancy...her smile and explanation and her care alwaz gave me glittering hopes in my life...I think she is one in million doctors in OBG...she is very thoughtful and very kind and very friendly....she made my delivery as safe and so comfortable...so also postnatal follow was awesome with her...greatly appreciated and yet I have no words to say it, but one have to feel and experience her motherly love and care.she is also a good counsellor as per my experience with her... great doctor...billion thanks to her and pray may her family be blessed....thank you for giving this opportunity to express my feelings...I recommend all my friends and colleague's in future...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr.is cool and composed. She's very positive in her profession.We started to visit her from 3rd trimister. Looking at the previous reports she could quickly assess the baby's Condition without insisting for any new check up's or diagnosis.


During our regular visit, she would listen to our queries with lot of patience & clarified all the doubts.

She supported a lot during the delivery 

We had a slight complication during the labor.

At this current scenario, where most of the experienced doctors doesn't want to take any risk & straight away end up doing C sections, she decided not to do a caesarean & preferred for normal delivery.

She monitored for almost 12 hrs with correct medications, after all the tense moments &  struggle, she was successful in a normal delivery.

Now I & my baby are healthy.

Trust & confidence is what we expect in a doctor & we could see both the things with her.

Thank you doctor for all your support you made my motherhood memorable.

Malini..

tags: None
review:
I have never met such a gynec in my life.. She is such a wonderful doctor with lots of patience.. My journey through out pregnancy was awesome. She gave right tips @ right time.. Whatever I asks,  she responds with very crisp and perfect replies.. She recommended me for physio,  pre natal sessions,  also helped with stem cells preservation..  I have learnt a lot.. She guided me very well..  My mom was impressed, and we stayed back in Bangalore instead of going Chennai (mom's place).. 

During normal delivery also what an experience,  she encouraged me a lot..

Mam,  you are really awesome!!!!  We love you..
reply_text: Thank u Sangeetha for the kind words

tags: None
review: I had to wait for an hour last my appointment time, while people who came much after me were sent in. Even after consultation, there is a wait for the examination, and then to speak to the doctor again. *** ****** ****** ********** *** *** *** ******** ******* *** ****** Will not be going here again

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr.usha for my pregnancy . she is so friendly and dedicated at her work..very understanding .. she attend every single phone call or she will call back if she miss the call.. such a humble person.. i had never expected that I would go for normal delivery.. with so much wait(14hrs) I had a normal delivery ..thanks a ton to doctor usha for supporting me the entire pregnancy and post pregnancy .. I definitely recommend Dr.usha for my family and friends .. With love Mrs.Sunitha Harsha

Mam gives ******* *********** * valuable guidance.
We had a cute baby girl through Normal delivery. 

We very thankfull to you mam....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We delivered( normal delivery)  our first baby at Apollo Cradle and I cant thank Dr.Usha for her steadfast support and encouragement. She is very calm and patient and listens to all our queries attentively. Not only that,she encourages normal delivery. Thanks to her recommendation, I took up prenatal yoga classes which helped me at the time of labor to a great extent. In short, Dr.Usha's guidance is exactly what you and your newborn need.
reply_text: Thank you Khateeja for the kind words

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Firstly thank you Dr Usha.. I had never met such a wonderful and down to earth person, who has lot of patience in my life. My journey of pregnancy  was awesome. She guided me whenever I call.. She always there to reduce our anxieties.. we had a great experience consulting her. 
We recommend Dr Usha for anyone who is planning for baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We consulted her from day 1 of my pregnancy thanks to her guidance *** ******* ********* despite of all my complications in pregnancy we have an healthy baby girl by my side today.Shes an amazing doctor who values ur time has patience for all ur queries.
Thanks mam for making my motherhood tension free and memorable..we love u

tags: None

She also explains the prose n cons of the treatment being performed.*** ** *** **** ************ **** * **** Thanks a ton doctor

tags: None
review:
I have been consulting Dr Usha right from the time I saw those two pink lines on the test kit. The journey has been for 6 months now and its being fun filled, without any complications or stress, only because of her time to time counselling and appropriate guidance for both me and my husband.
She is a doctor par excellence and an amazing human being. I would definitely recommend her to everyone who wants their mother hood to be pleasurable :)

tags: None

reply_text: Thank u Nandini for the kind words

tags: None
review: I consulted doc usha During 7th month of my pregnancy. She s an excellent doctor I have Ever met. *** ** *** **** ************ ** ***** Her level of patience is highly appreciated and she comes out with apt solutions to any kind of problems. She s one among those few doctors who spends time with her patients , analyze their reports and treat them with atmost care . I would strongly recommend her and assure that you and your baby will be in safe hands. *** * * *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: The doctor patiently listened to our queries and accordingly advised medicines. Also she suggested for one ultrasound. I am waiting to visit again with ultrasound report. I am waiting for the next step prescription from the doctor. Overall as of now the experience was good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My husband and I would like to thank dr. Usha for the guidance and the care with which she handled my pregnancy . For someone who is paranoid about hospital and doctors , she made me feel so comfortable and enjoy the entire process . At every stage she explained the progress of my pregnancy and pushed me to exercise , eat healthy and do what it takes to facilitate normal delivery . Thanks to her guidance I delivered a baby boy in September .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** **** ** **** ********* I am so thankful to dr usha for her care towards her patients.. She is very co-operative and understand the patient very patiently... Totally good experience with the doctor... Highly recommendedüëçüëçüëçüëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We were overwhelmed by the treatment from Usha BR . I would strongly recommend Usha mam because of her friendliness and explantation on treatment to her patients . I was been well taken care at Apollo Jayanagar as being Usha mam's patient . Thank you Mam !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was extremely happy to have finally found a very good Gynaecologist close to my place and who is extremely friendly, ************* *** gives great counselling and provides the best solution to our problems. I have consulted her thrice and I really felt very comfortable interacting with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I approached Dr.Usha as I had planned my delivery at Apollo cradle... I was fickle n nervous as I had lost my first baby due to it's health complications which was identified after my c-sec delivery...So my all wish was to get a healthy baby this time... 

Thanks a ton to Dr Usha for getting me a healthy baby... She s so friendly, active and approachable anytime... She did all checks/tests that a pregnant lady should undergo till the delivery... Though she looks young, her experience in handling patients is commendable... Overall she s superb and intelligent I should be thankful for her for giving me such a beautiful baby:-)

tags: Wait time,
review:
My sister admitted in BGS for delivery and she had an dengue. But doctor has done c- section after our confirmation. baby is fine. But my sister is no more now.
****** **** *** **** **** ********* *** **** *** ** ******* She gave full wrong report instead of c - section, mentioned normal delivery. My sister is blessed with baby girl. but in report mentioned boy baby. Our family fully frustrated and we lost our beloved sister in our family. I really not to suggest this doctor to anyone. we are really disappointed with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Usha is very friendly, she listens to all ur queries and answers them. I had a very large fibroid and i was treated by her. She performed laproscopic myomectomy, and successfully removed my large fibroid, while many doctors told me that i might have to undergo open surgery, Dr Usha ensured me that she would perform laproscopic surgery. Its been 7 days post op and i have had no issues, no bleeding, no major pain, i am healing well. So my experience with her has been really good. I would highly recommend her üòä

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited for a lot of reasons along with some Ultrasound tests already done. I checked her ratings first and then decided to choose her hence it feels more bad now. She hardly spend 4 minutes with me. She expected me to know everything that's wrong with the organs. Might have been a hurry. I had to ask her which medicine is for what. She could've explained it properly knowing the patient could be stressed or might not understand it as not everyone is from a medical background. You charge 650 rupees for a patient, atleast spend 10 minutes. I'll be visiting another gynecologist now to get a second opinion.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Usha is a brilliant and energetic doctor who has tremendous passion towards her job . We had approached her for second opinion for my uterine fibroid and she gave full hope and confidence to do it laproscopically rather than open. It was a great experience with her right from the first meet, her friendly attutude and professionalism made us really comfortable that made us felt we were in safe hands. The entire process went smooth and flawless. She owns up everything and does an end to end care, that displayed her genuine care and passion for helping woman. We thank her a lot for her care and easy to approach attitude and hope she continues this for every woman who seeks for a genuine health care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Maternal Care/ Checkup,
review: ******* ** ** ** ***** *** supported my full pregnancy. I gave birth to baby boy and normal delivery. I did have less water but she tried really hard to help me walk the journey of pregnancy. She gives emotional support a lot...i would highly recommend you all to consult Dr.Usha.** ****** *** ** ** ***** *** made my pregnancy smoother. She goes beyond economic...first preference is for the treatment and very honest in giving clear picture of the health. I have tortured the doctor Usha by not co-operating to her treatment but she never and ever lost patience with me...i'm a tough patient to manage :P I will continue to consult Dr.Usha :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She is cool and calm in nature.She treated her patients very well. She is friendly in nature. It was really an amazing experience to take treatment from her.She Gives time to each patient, I consulted her during my wife pregnancy. She treat each and every pateint like a friend and she is always available on WhatsApp and on phone. Anytime we call her or msg her she is available for help. Gives proper time for consultation and will solve our queries. She dont push us to visit her every time.

Thank you Madam for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a very good experience with doctor,she is very friendly ..and have more patience ..I visited many hospitals  in Bangalore to conceive ..but I didn't conceived .....I met Dr. Usha  on 30 Jan 2016 and explained throuoghly all my   problems ..my problem was I aborted thrice....,she looked after  me with  high care  ultimately Dr.Usha identified the cause for abortion and gave a treatment ..I conceived in October 2016,since it was my precious pregnancy doctor looked after me very well and  she is down to earth .... she is very good hearted person ..I blessed with BABY GIRL on July 2017 ,Thanks mam ....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went for my wife treatment. One of our family friend suggested her name. Though it is far from our place but it was worth going there. My wife was down with lower abdomen pain for quite a few months. We contacted several doctors but their medication didn't work. At last Dr Usha identified the problem and accordingly medication started and it was cured. Apart from the above short explanation i would say Dr Usha puts an air of humaneness while treating. She responds to the call / messages, if not immediately then for sure later on. Although Doctors are many but a doctor on whom you can trust without any doubt are very few, and i would say Dr Usha is one of them. God bless her and her supporting staffs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr.Usha Ma'am is very friendly , understanding and soft in nature and she cares a patient very well like her own family member,explains the situation to patient clearly and gives time to share the problem and she takes opinion from patient before proceeding further ...Usha Ma'am's smiling face makes the patient to cure their health problem at earliest...I had never felt that I am talking to doctor it was always an experience that I was talking to my  mother and she is very great to be a doctor....she deserves lot of thanks from my side....I am very lucky to get Usha Ma'am as my doctor.....

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: it was a worth visiting the doctor, ease of communication between doctor and us was the most important thing that made us more comfortable to explain our concerns and understand doctors suggestions.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
